description: This file provides a wrapper around browser local storage with SSR (Server-Side Rendering) guards. It includes functions to safely get, set, and remove items from local storage, with additional JSON serialization/deserialization helpers that handle errors gracefully.

methods.description: Sets an item in local storage if available.

methods.description: Removes an item from local storage if available.

methods.name: storage.getJSON
methods.description: Retrieves a JSON value from local storage and parses it, returning a fallback on error or if not found.

methods.name: storage.setJSON
methods.description: Stringifies a value as JSON and stores it in local storage.
